PHP SwfTools¶

PHP SwfTools is a lib for manipulating PDF files and SWF files with SWFTools (http://www.swftools.org/).

This project is released under MIT License.

API¶

API is quite simple : Two objects should be mainly used and cover the needs : FlashFile and PDFFile. These objects extends SplFileInfo.

Exceptions¶

Using Custom Configuration¶

PHP SwfTools autodetects SWFTools binaries on most *nix systems with the command where. If you would like to provide your own configuration, you can do it at many level :

Files Level¶

<?php

use SwfTools\PDFFile;
use SwfTools\Configuration;

$PDF = new PDFFile('file.pdf');
/* Will autodetect pdf2swf location */
$PDF->toSwf('destination.swf');

$PDF = new PDFFile('file.pdf', new Configuration('pdf2swf'=>'/my/custom/path/to/pdf2swf'));
/* Will use /my/custom/path/to/pdf2swf */
$PDF->toSwf('destination.swf');

Binary Level¶

<?php

use SwfTools\Binary\Pdf2swf;
use SwfTools\Configuration;

/* Specify binary */
$adapter = new Pdf2swf('/my/custom/path/to/pdf2swf');
$adapter->toSwf('input_file.pdf', 'output_file.swf');

/* Autodetect binary */
$adapter = Pdf2swf::load(new Configuration(array()));
$adapter->toSwf('input_file.pdf', 'output_file.swf');
